projects.description: On-line employee directory for a fictious company. Data is retrieved from randomuser.me API. Employees can be filtered by name. Clicking on a card displays an overlay with more information and buttons to display adjacent employee cards on the grid.
Guess letters to complete a movie quote. The keyboard highlights the letters that have been guessed. Up to 5 incorrect guesses are allowed.

Registration page for a fictitious conference. Fields are dynamically disabled or hidden based on other fields. Validation failures display error message near the invalid value. (Note: The form submission is not coded to post to an actual server.)
List of students with pagination and filtering. Search term immediately filters the lists and updates pagination. Data is hardcoded in HTML.
App randomly selects a quote from a set of nine. Another quote is displayed every 10 seconds unless the user clicks the Show Another button.
